description:
Sales Director, B2B Well-being Platform

Are you passionate about empowering businesses to prioritize employee well-being? Join Stay Healthy Zone a leader in the B2B wellness space and drive the success of our innovative platform to transform workplaces. As our Sales Director, you'll spearhead our B2B sales efforts, building strategic partnerships to make a lasting impact on the health and happiness of employees.

What you'll do:
• Develop and implement a comprehensive B2B sales strategy, setting ambitious yet achievable goals.
• Identify and cultivate relationships with key decision-makers at corporations, healthcare organizations, and other potential clients.
• Craft compelling pitches and presentations that showcase the value proposition of our well-being platform and address customer pain points.
• Negotiate and close deals, exceeding targets and securing long-term partnerships.
• Analyze sales data and market trends to continuously refine your strategy and adapt to changing market dynamics.
• Collaborate with marketing, product, and customer success to ensure a seamless client experience.

Who you are:
• A seasoned sales leader with a proven track record of success in B2B technology or enterprise sales.
• A passionate advocate for employee well-being with a deep understanding of the challenges and opportunities it presents in the workplace.
• An expert communicator with exceptional presentation, negotiation, and relationship-building skills.
• A strategic thinker with the ability to analyze data and translate insights into actionable sales strategies.
• A highly motivated and results-oriented leader who thrives in a fast-paced environment.

What we offer:
• The opportunity to make a real difference in the lives of employees by driving the adoption of a life-changing well-being platform.
• A dynamic and supportive work environment where your contributions are valued and celebrated.
• Competitive compensation and benefits package, including equity options.
• Continuous learning and development opportunities to help you reach your full potential.

Are you ready to be a champion for employee well-being? We are eager to hear from you!

Please submit your resume and cover letter to steve@stayhealthyzone.com with "Sales Director - Well-being Platform" in the subject line.

Let's build healthier workplaces together.
